word_mean: 铷：碱性稀有金属元素，原子序数37，原子量85.47，符号Rb

sentence.Network_en: The rubidium lamps and cells are now obtainable only for replacement.
sentence.Network_cn: 现在能够得到的铷光源和容器仅作备用.

sentence.Network_en: But the effective size for rubidium atoms is 50 times smaller.
sentence.Network_cn: 然而铷的有效截面却小上50倍.

sentence.Network_en: Meanwhile, we take some improvement measure in order to improve the rubidium atomic frequency standard.
sentence.Network_cn: 同时通过定量分析对电路实现提出了一系列优选方案, 从而使铷原子频标的性能得到改善.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: modern Latin, from Latin rubidus 'red' (with reference to its spectral lines)

means.word_mean: 1. a soft silvery metallic element of the alkali metal group; burns in air and reacts violently in water; occurs in carnallite and lepidolite and pollucite
